personal.name: Shaun Prince
personal.title: Full-Stack Developer & Cloud Architect
personal.summary: Passionate full-stack developer and cloud architect with over 15 years of experience building scalable applications and infrastructure. Founder and technical lead at SolidRusT Networks, architecting production AI inference platforms and Kubernetes-based infrastructure.

experience.title: Founder & Technical Lead
experience.summary: Founded and architected a production AI inference platform serving multiple consumer-facing applications.
highlights: Built 12-node Kubernetes cluster with 5 GPU workers (60GB VRAM total)
Implemented GitOps workflows with FluxCD for zero-downtime deployments
Developed PAM platform for API key management and Stripe billing integration
Created multi-agent AI systems and RAG pipelines with vLLM and LiteLLM
Designed and deployed production inference platform with 99.9% uptime
Built consumer applications: solidrust.net, aidiant.com, myashes.ai

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
experience.summary: Delivered full-stack applications and cloud infrastructure for diverse clients across multiple industries.
highlights: Developed React/TypeScript frontends with Node.js and Python backends
Containerized applications with comprehensive CI/CD pipelines
Deployed to AWS and self-hosted Kubernetes environments
Implemented monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions
Reduced client infrastructure costs by 40% through optimization

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
experience.summary: Automated infrastructure and deployment processes for enterprise clients.
highlights: Reduced deployment time by 80% through automation and CI/CD implementation
Implemented comprehensive monitoring and alerting systems
Managed AWS and Azure cloud infrastructure for multiple clients
Developed Infrastructure as Code with Terraform and Ansible
Led migration of legacy applications to containerized environments

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.summary: Built web applications and internal tools across multiple technology stacks.
highlights: Developed full-stack web applications using PHP, Python, and JavaScript
Created RESTful APIs and database-driven applications
Implemented responsive designs and cross-browser compatibility
Collaborated with design and product teams in agile environments
